tno.defaultPlaceholder.name: Placeholder name
tno.defaultPlaceholder.hint: The placeholder name to display when hiding token names (PLEASE NOTE: changing this value can sometimes result in adding unintentional prefixes/suffixes if the Preserve Affixes option is on)
tno.allowHUDButton.name: Create HUD button
tno.allowHUDButton.hint: Uncheck to avoid creating HUD button
tno.allowPlayerOwned.name: Allow Player tokens
tno.allowPlayerOwned.hint: Check to allow obfuscation on player-owned tokens
tno.allowPreserveAffixes.name: Preserve Affixes
tno.allowPreserveAffixes.hint: Uncheck to ignore prefixes/suffixes and only use basic actor/placeholder names
